chart.title: Leading cancer types causing death in men
chart.subtitle: The most common cause of [cancer](#dod:cancer) deaths in men, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
chart.note: Only shown for countries with sufficient levels of [death registration](#dod:crvs).

Leading cancer types causing death in ma.titleShort: Leading cancer types causing death in males
Leading cancer types causing death in ma.titleLong: Leading cancer types causing death in males
Leading cancer types causing death in ma.descriptionShort: The most common cause of [cancer](#dod:cancer) deaths in males, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.
Leading cancer types causing death in ma.descriptionProcessing: The most common cancer type as a cause of death was identified using the total number of deaths from every type of cancer.
Leading cancer types causing death in ma.citationShort: WHO Mortality Database (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
Leading cancer types causing death in ma.citationLong: WHO Mortality Database (2024) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “Leading cancer types causing death in males” [dataset]. WHO Mortality Database, “WHO Mortality Database” [original data].
